oracle.adf.share.mds
Interface MDSTransResetListener

All Known Subinterfaces:
MDSTransListener
All Known Implementing Classes:
MDSTransResetListenerImpl
public interface MDSTransResetListener

Interface that contains the callback API's that are invoked during finalFlushChanges call of MDSTransManager. Note that these callback happen only when there are pending changes in mdsSession

See Also:
MDSTransManager

Method Summary
 java.lang.Object getClientContext()
          Returns the context set on listener instance.
 void postFlushException(MDSTransContext mdsTransCon)
          This method is invoked when an exception happens during finalFlushChanges() call.
 void postSuccessfulFlush(MDSTransContext mdsTrasnCon)
          This method is invoked after a successful finalFlushChanges() call i.e.
 

Method Detail

postFlushException

void postFlushException(MDSTransContext mdsTransCon)
This method is invoked when an exception happens during finalFlushChanges() call. This method is invoked before MDSTransManager cancels the changes in MDSSession

Parameters:
mdsTransCon - the callback context

getClientContext

java.lang.Object getClientContext()
Returns the context set on listener instance. The framework does not use this and it is purely for the client code to store any information on the listener instance

Returns:

postSuccessfulFlush

void postSuccessfulFlush(MDSTransContext mdsTrasnCon)
This method is invoked after a successful finalFlushChanges() call i.e. when mdsSession.flushChanges succeeds.

Parameters:
mdsTransCon - the callback context
